creator: rchang@eecs.tufts.edu
text:
add "tmpDir" attribute to <junit> task so users can specify
where temp files are written. currently cannot change the default of
the base dir. This causes a problem for those who's base dir is not writable by 
default.
if the tmpDir attr is not set, then it should default to base dir.
tempdir attribute should be available starting with nightly build 2003-04-01.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
